head.title: Northland Pines School District | Empowering All Individuals to Reach Their Potential | Eagle River, WI

meta.name: description
meta.content: Northland Pines School District located in Eagle River, WI and servicing Vilas County and surrounding areas.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Northland, Pines, School, District, Northland Pines School District, Eagle River, WI, Schools, Elementary, High School, Land O'Lakes, St. Germain, Eagle River, Wisconsin, Vilas County, district office, school, gold leed certified, history of the high school, Northland Pines School District, Northland Pines High School, Eagle River High School

div.div:
We are still educating our students virtually and serving them meals via parking lot pick ups Mondays (6 meals) and Thursdays (4 meals + extra food) 10:30 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. at all 6 sites. The Middle and High School site is open every day for families that miss or cannot make one of the other days 6:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Thank you to everyone who is helping with the meal program and to our community for all their support through this challenging time! #PinesPride
Read More >

div.p: The Northland Pines School District is committed to providing safe, positive, and productive educational environments for all students. While the governor’s “Safer at Home” guidelines have temporarily...

We are still educating our students virtually and serving them meals via parking lot pick ups Mondays (6 meals) and Thursdays (4 meals + extra food) 10:30 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. at all 6 sites. The Middle and...

div.p: NEW MONTHLY SUPPLEMENTAL MEAL DELIVERY: We are excited to announce FORK Cares. Each student who qualifies for free lunch, will have the opportunity to receive 12 supplemental meals per month for the months of June, July...

div.p: The Northland Pines Board of Education approved expansion of our current 4K program from two days per week to four days per week! After surveying parents, doing research and talking to the current 4K staff, it was...
